content.rendered:
[vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=”” css=”.vc_custom_1710931764588{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”7/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1713346733444{margin-bottom: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://qualitybio.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/impact-min.jpg?id=492) !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=”element_from_top” transition_delay=”300″][vc_column_inner el_class=”counter1″ width=”1/2″]

100000 +

Acres saved from Burning

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
20000+

Farmers have been monetarily impacted

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=”element_from_bottom” transition_delay=”500″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
150000

MT of CO2 emissions have been reduced

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Affordable and Carbon neutral Energy being utilised in place of fossil fuels

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/12″][vc_column_text]

Impact

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

  • At Quality Group we are committed to UN SDG’s and adding positive impact on the environment and communities
  • Social impact: by monetarily enabling every stakeholder involved in the supply chain including marginal rural farmers, farm labor, farm equipment owners, vehicle drivers and indirect beneficiaries
  • Environmental impact: More than 100,000 acres of harvested land is being saved every season from burning of Biomass post harvesting. This has an enormous impact on the Air quality index around.
  • Economic impact: Affordable and carbon neutral energy being utilized by corporations.
  • 100,000 Acres saved from Burning.
  • 20,000 (aprox) farmers have been monetarily impacted.
  • 150,000 MT of CO2 emissions have been reduced.
  • Affordable and Carbon neutral Energy being utilized in place of fossil fuels.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=”” css=”.vc_custom_1713337168300{padding-top: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”grid” text_align=”left” css_animation=””][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

“Welcome to the sustainable era! At Quality Group, we’re excited to introduce biofuels, derived from renewable plant matter and agricultural residues, paving the way for a greener, carbon-neutral energy future.”

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_single_image image=”366″ img_size=”full” qode_css_animation=””][/vc_column][/vc_row]
